name: 7-20-4 - The Hustler Series - Toro Gordo
additionalNotes:
A unique and striking addition to your collection with The Hustler from Kurt Kendall and the folks at 7-20-4. An authentic barber pole wrapper alternates with an Ecuador Connecticut and a Brazilian wrapper leaf. Underneath rests a medium-bodied combination of Costa Rican binders and Nicaraguan long-filler
